title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Pairing up with like-minded souls foments inspiration and becomes an incubator for creative ideas. Whether you gather with colleagues for work, activism, or charity, the spiritual Pisces Moons conjunction with unifying Neptune leaves you tingling as you merge together for one cause. The one drawback is that you must remind yourself that a lone voice can be as important as the voice of the collective. Focus on inclusivity over exclusivity, since any group is only as strong as all its parts. Anthropologist Margaret Mead wrote, Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world; indeed, it's the only thing that ever has. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
